channel.title: Can i use utorrent to portforward
channel.description: i have a labtop and connect to my linksys wireless. and i tryed portforwarding with it but it wont work. can i use the utorrent instead for portforwarding?

item.title: Can i use utorrent to portforward
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

linksys is just horrible i have it also. Idk if its for all but i think most of them you cant open ports. Ive also tried with utorrent ect so you might want to find somone to host, get new router or vps. =\ Ima try to get new router soon. Hope you gl but to your answer is probly no.

Read full topic
